title: I would be willing to pay ludicrous amounts of money for this Icon
body:
https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Q-cUO0tDFAM/Vw6Ri7kMgNI/AAAAAAAANao/tuNt0G2whlIiJUg3ekQmmYiPlPkVnPR2wCLcB/s1600/Evelynn_Square_0.png

I am an Eve main, and with the new splash art coming out, I have never been so excited for a default skin in all the 4-5 years I have played this game. I am the owner of the Evelynn Mains club in NA [Eveln] and I would do anything..... ANYTHING for this.


Please riot make my wish come true!

If anybody knows the Artist who made this beautiful art I would like to know who it is so I can thank them!

EDIT: TO ALL THE LOST EVE MAINS, YOU ARE WELCOME TO JOIN MY [Eveln] CLUB!!! COME FIND ME!

replies.body: I seriously want champion icons as summoner icons. I really hope we get them as a champion mastery reward at higher levels of champion mastery.
Seriously... it would be perfect
This splash makes me want to play Eve so bad, but I don't know how good she is right now. Any tips?

Dont need ignite imo but to each his own, I use flash quite often for buffer E flash out of stealth and i can oneshot the carries most of the time when i have a few items...

As for other generic tips, BE SUPER GREEDY, dont let team take your kills, once u snowball you tilt the enemy team harder than anyone. 

Go {{item:1402}} most games, she has no cc pre 6, and shes all about early game... {{item:1414}} can work fine but, you generally want the blue smite slow for optimal ganks pre 6

Build {{item:3100}}  second item, then go either {{item:3116}}  /{{item:3157}}  /{{item:3001}}  ... if you fell badly behind build tank .... or skip {{item:3100}}  and go straight to {{item:3116}}   ... maybe go {{item:3025}}  if you are desperate for armor... and the best DPS boots are {{item:3158}} especially when you play her flash like I do.

Go AD reds, Armor Yellows, AP Quints/Glyphs 

12/18/0 thunderlords use my second mastery page here http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=raelaem

1 point in vampirism (I copy a korean evelynn main and he does this because you want the scaling from the natural talent because it double dips into eve's power in her abilities, but the 1 point in vampirism is highly cost effective for 1 point which gets amplified by the jg item)

I was a gold 5 last season with her with a winrate of 70%, so if you are around my elo, my thoughts should help. Haven't played much ranked this season though, not really motivated with how riot changed things.

there are many different builds atm my standard is {{item:1412}} {{item:3116}} {{item:3748}} . i dont always need boots but when they are essentially {{item:3009}} . for the rest i go tanky. usually {{item:3742}}  but depending on the situation {{item:3102}} {{item:3075}} or even {{item:3157}} or {{item:3025}}   work great^^ with this build ur totally going to be a melee champ, meaning u can stay in fights for some time and tank for a while instead of bursting and running away. 

Raelaem is right that you need some feed but its not essentially. important are teamfights. you need to know when you can engage and when not. last season i used to play her full ap but if your team sucks theres no way you can carry them that way. 

As for runes 8x mark of ad, 1x mark of crit chance, 9x seal of armor, 9x glyph of scaling mr and 3 quintessences of attack speed (basic adc runes i think but im not sure since i never play adc lel xD) as for masteries im going for fervor of battle. to lazy to go in detail here though^^

 since eve starts really squishy i don't recommend early ganks. depending on the situation it can work out though. also i start at golems, going straight to the enemy's blue afterwards. since you're invisible you can easily check if your enemy started blue or red side. if he started red i take his blue. if he started blue but didn't yet kill blue i wait for him until he's almost done and take both xP you need to be a little sneaky in order to get full build as fast as you can, so you can be usefull in teamfights

Bursting and running away is why I play her full AP... its incredibly satisfying to know I just made someone look dumb to their team, and I often tilt people into afking because of it. Being greedy is more beneficial for Full Ap eve for sure. Of course there are some times I get the occasional {{item:3742}} or {{item:3102}} if I need some tankiness but its just depends on the game. Also if you do some innovative clears that I'd rather not share you can pull off some interesting gank paths that really confuse the enemy jungler where you might be. Level 3 ganks and then camping the guys lane you just killed will insta tilt them into raging at their team. (I play eve to tilt people, not to win... and I end up winning because of it....what can I say... I have her personality)
i love the moments when the enemy is low life running away from the rest of your team and ends up running right into your face xD trollface incoming xD im not playin to tilt people though^^
Thanks!

Bring {{summoner:11}} and {{summoner:14}} , go to enemy jungle at lvl 2 for the first blood.
Recommend build {{item:1402}} {{item:3100}} {{item:3116}} {{item:3742}} {{item:3001}} (or {{item:3102}}) {{item:1306}}
I would prefer the ult icon for summoner icon

....Karthus Ult Icon....

10/10 must have, would sp00p again :D

Only problem is in the OCE server there's already a Fizz icon and pretty much everyone has it.
What is Riot going to do about that?
Hell, even I would use it :D

> [{quoted}](name=Malicious Metal,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=WAL6nqPJ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-04-14T21:24:34.511+0000)
>
> Hell, even I would use it :D

You would, till Morde gets a new splash amirite
That'll be 5000 RP. Cough up.
=(... The sad part is... I would at least consider it for a brief moment in time.
And after considering it you would get it?
If I was drunk enough, probably

Solution: never be drunk. Or never have money.
Better yet, both.
sounds like a paradox
honestly, i'd use this too, and i'm nowhere near an Eve main.
I've been getting pulled towards eve alot recently {{item:3285}} and {{item:3116}} are amazing on her I wish I had found this out sooner.
Hey Raelaem! I agree, I think the new Evelynn splash is amazing. I was wondering though, if I could join the Evelynn Mains club. I added you on my main and my smurf Chronior. Thanks!
Aren't you in our Zyra mains club too!?! LMAO do you main the same 2 champs I do?
Any tips for a prospective Zyra main (support)? I've been spamming her in ranked lately, could use some advice if you folks would like to share.

I've only played her a few times on free week, but I noticed a pretty cool strategy or two. Your seeds don't cost mana so you can use em to facecheck bushes. 

You can also put seeds down in a linear path to the enemy before using your E. It takes a bit of prediction but it lets you stun them and make plants near them at the same time. Seeds last quite awhile so you don't have to do it all at once.
Thanks for the tip(s)!
Someone take my wallet away from me before I get on this wagon!

I honestly think they're missing out on a lot of potential revenue by putting in tons of icons for things that people can use, like the above requested Eve portrait, which probably wouldn't be that hard to put in nor that data intensive to add.

I don't think this is about revenue. If the goal was to pump out content for money, i think Riot can very well crop the images of champion splashes and sell them in a store.
But if these were rewards for new levels of Champion Mastery, then i'd feel like i earned it fair and square. And not sharing the same icon with a guy who obviously wanted to buy the icon, not playing the champion in question.
I would love to have this option
i loves her <3
that's the champion square lol
yep =)
I main Warwick, and this would be one beast-ass icon.
Upvote
I don't want the icon, i want this skin (instead of just new splashart that doesn't even look like the current eve xD)  but the icon is cool as well. eve main here as well^^
Is there a nocturnes main club i could join somewhere out there maybe a yorick club?

what about urgot mains club {{champion:6}} 

not even riot wants to be in that club ;-;
i like urgot but im no where near a main, i do play him more then the average player though ;)

Riot,

https://media.giphy.com/media/wErJXg1tIgHXG/giphy.gif
There was a lot of talk about having champion summoner icons being unlockable by getting to a certain champion mastery tier. Then Riot never updated champion mastery tiers.

I would buy that, I don't even have Evelynn but that is great.
I just got owned by an full AD Lifesteal Eve, still won but god damn, she could out sustain our xin Zhao
Evelynn Notoriously has a hard time with devour junglers though so thats impressive
Xin killed her in the end, but holy shit it was close. Thankfully Xin is busted and Eve isn't :D

I am a Eve main, i am with  you.

I also love the new Splash art.
